title: State files lawsuit to recoup $24 million in welfare funds from Brett Favre, WWE wrestlers and 34 other people or companies - Mississippi Today
content:
1. State files lawsuit to recoup $24 million in welfare funds from Brett Favre, WWE wrestlers and 34 other people or companies  Mississippi Today
  2. Mississippi names Brett Favre in $24M lawsuit seeking repayment of misspent welfare funds  Yahoo Sports
  3. State of Mississippi sues Brett Favre, three former pro wrestlers over misspent welfare dollars  WISN 12 News
  4. Brett Favre, wrestlers sued by Mississippi over welfare misspending: report  Fox News
  5. Ted DiBiase, sons Ted & Brett sued by Mississippi for misued federal funds  Figure Four Online
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Mississippi Department of Human Services filed a civil lawsuit against 38 individuals or entities it says took welfare money from the state.
